divs: sighting detailsthe information below was summitted by stephen cox, chief field investigator for ny mufon, i recieved an e-mail with the information below: hi my name is joe. i live in stony point,ny this evening i saw something i can't explain. i was driving down central highway towards the stony point post office and i saw 5 lights in the sky. 3 of the lights made a triangular shape with an additional 2 lights on either side. the lights together in shape. i pulled in to the post office with my friend who was with me and we got out to look. we watched 3\5 lights disappear and that left one back light and the light on the point. they continued to stay together than the tip light disappeared. the last light turned slowly towards the west and moved away until it disappeared. the lights were big, very noticeable xenon colored lights. i have never seen anything like that in my life.
Summary: I saw something I can't explain.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around August 27th 2011
